tagline: Welcome to my corner of the internet
summary: I build thoughtful software products and enjoy working across the stack. Lately I'm especially excited about data-heavy experiences, reliable systems, and making tools that help teams move faster.

paragraphs: I'm a software engineer who loves turning ambiguous problems into reliable products. I care deeply about bridging product thinking with engineering craft so the things we build are both resilient and useful.

My work often spans backend systems, APIs, and frontends with polish. I'm comfortable collaborating across functions, writing clear docs, and setting up processes that keep teams moving quickly without sacrificing quality.
Away from the keyboard you'll usually find me reading, sketching ideas, or exploring new places to eat with friends. Curiosity keeps me learning, and I try to bring that spirit into every project.

highlights.title: Engineering
highlights.description: Experience building scalable web applications and distributed systems

highlights.title: Product
highlights.description: Enjoy collaborating with design and product to ship what users need

highlights.title: Leadership
highlights.description: Comfortable owning initiatives and mentoring teammates

highlights.title: Writing
highlights.description: Document ideas clearly so teams can align quickly

experience.description: Leading the development of AI-powered developer tools that help engineering teams ship faster. I work across the stack, from designing system architecture to implementing ML pipelines and crafting intuitive user interfaces.
highlights: Architected a real-time code analysis system processing millions of daily requests
Reduced inference latency by optimizing models and caching strategies
Mentored junior engineers and shaped engineering best practices

experience.description: Built core infrastructure for a B2B SaaS platform serving enterprise customers. Focused on reliability, performance, and developer experience.
highlights: Designed and implemented a multi-tenant architecture supporting 99.99% uptime
Led migration from monolith to microservices, reducing deployment time
Created internal tooling that improved developer productivity

experience.description: Early engineer at a seed-stage startup, wearing many hats from frontend development to DevOps. Learned to move fast and iterate based on user feedback.
highlights: Built the MVP that secured seed funding
Implemented real-time collaboration features using WebSockets
Established engineering practices that scaled with the team

projects.title: CodeFlow
projects.description: An open-source VS Code extension that uses AI to generate code documentation in real-time. Built with TypeScript and the OpenAI API.

projects.title: DataPipe
projects.description: A lightweight ETL framework for Python that makes it easy to build and deploy data pipelines.

projects.title: UIKit Pro
projects.description: A comprehensive React component library with 100+ accessible, customizable components. Built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: DevMetrics
projects.description: A self-hosted analytics platform for tracking developer productivity metrics. Integrates with GitHub, GitLab, and Jira.
